meanings.sent1: The cheesiest pizza had so much melted cheese on top.
meanings.sent2: The cheesiest dish at the restaurant was the macaroni and cheese.
meanings.sent3: The cheesiest cheeseburger in town was so gooey and delicious.
meanings.sent4: The cheesiest fondue party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent5: The cheesiest grilled cheese sandwich was a gooey delight.

meanings.definition: Lacking taste, style, or originality; overly sentimental or emotional.
meanings.sent1: The cheesiest movie made everyone cry with its sappy ending.
meanings.sent2: Her cheesiest love letter was filled with clichés and over-the-top declarations.
meanings.sent3: The cheesiest romantic comedy had the audience rolling their eyes at every scene.
meanings.sent4: His cheesiest pick-up line was so cringeworthy, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The cheesiest greeting card made her smile with its heartfelt message.

meanings.definition: To be overly exaggerated or clichéd.
meanings.sent1: She cheesiest her way through the performance, hamming up every line.
meanings.sent2: The actor cheesiest his lines, making the audience groan at the melodrama.
meanings.sent3: He cheesiest his story to make it more interesting, but it just sounded fake.
meanings.sent4: The singer cheesiest her performance, hitting all the high notes for dramatic effect.
meanings.sent5: They cheesiest their presentation with flashy graphics and over-the-top effects.
